options.content:
Status: PASS
Created: 4 Dec, 00:11
Started by: ankita.waghela16@gmail.com

## Summary

This report summarizes a test run of the test "bdd_loadtest". It was performed on
December 4th, 2024 and is considered to be successful.

The test was configured to run up to **50 VUs** for 5 min.
The sections below give a more detailed breakdown.

config.description: The number of HTTP requests made.
config.label: Request Rate
config.name: http_reqs

config.description: The rate of failed requests returned from the remote host.
config.label: Failure Rate
config.name: http_req_failed

config.description: The average time it took to process complete requests.
config.label: Avg. Response time
config.name: http_req_duration

config.description: The 95th percentile of the time it took to process complete requests.
config.label: Response Time
config.name: http_req_duration

options.content:
## Performance overview

The 95th percentile response time of the system being tested was **13  ms**
and **612 470 requests** were made at an average request rate of
**2 187 reqs/s**.

There were a total 612 470 failed requests, meaning 
that 100% of requests failed. The average failure rate was 
**2 260 reqs/s**, peaking at 4 402 reqs/s.

options.content:
## Top 10 slowest URLs (sorted by P95 response time)

 
  There were requests to 2 unique URLs, with 
  612 470 different responses received. The 
  slowest response had a P95 response time of 13  ms.

# Checks

The test had **2** different checks that were evaluated a total of
**612 470** times, of which **612 470** failed. Overall the
success rate was **0%**. The 2 checks with the highest failure rate failed **100%**
of the time.

# Thresholds


The run met all of its performance expectations, with none of the defined thresholds having been
exceeded.

## Response time

The maximum response time occurred at **28 VUs**, with a response 
time of **70  ms**. The average response time at the same point in time was **10  ms**, 
with 95% of requests taking less than **13  ms**.

options.content:
## Throughput

The test had an overall average request rate of **2 260 reqs/s**, peaking at an
average of **4 402 reqs/s** while running **49 VUs**.

options.content:
## Bandwidth

The amount of data sent peaked at **49 VUs**, sending **1.3 MB/s** of 
data. Data received had its peak at **49 VUs** with **13.4 MB/s** being received. 
A total of **182 MB** was sent and **1.82 GB** received during the course of 
the entire run.
